Uses of Class
org.pircbotx.PircBotX

Packages that use PircBotX
org.pircbotx Core PircBotX classes 
org.pircbotx.hooks General Listener classes 
org.pircbotx.hooks.events All supported events of PircBotX 
org.pircbotx.hooks.managers Listener Manager interface and implementations 
org.pircbotx.hooks.types Generic Interfaces for groups of events that do generally the same thing

Classes in org.pircbotx.hooks with type parameters of type PircBotX
 class Event<T extends PircBotX>
           
 interface Listener<T extends PircBotX>
           
 class ListenerAdapter<T extends PircBotX>
          Adapter that provides methods to capture each event separately, removing the need to check, cast, and call your custom method for each event you want to capture.
 

Uses of PircBotX in org.pircbotx.hooks.events
 

Classes in org.pircbotx.hooks.events with type parameters of type PircBotX
 class ActionEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called whenever an ACTION is sent from a user.
 class ChannelInfoEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          After calling the listChannels() method in PircBotX, the server will start to send us information about each channel on the server.
 class ConnectEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched once we successfully connected to the IRC server.
 class DisconnectEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched when we get disconnected.
 class FileTransferFinishedEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event gets dispatched when a DccFileTransfer has finished.
 class FingerEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever we receive a FINGER request.
 class HalfOpEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a user (possibly us) gets halfop status granted in a channel.
 class IncomingChatRequestEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event will be dispatched whenever a DCC Chat request is received.
 class IncomingFileTransferEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever a DCC SEND request is sent to the PircBotX.
 class InviteEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when we are invited to a channel by a user.
 class JoinEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever someone (possibly us) joins a channel which we are on.
 class KickEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever someone (possibly us) is kicked from any of the channels that we are in.
 class MessageEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Used whenever a message is sent to a channel.
 class ModeEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Used when the mode of a channel is set.
 class MotdEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched when the Motd is finished being sent.
 class NickChangeEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever someone (possibly us) changes nick on any of the channels that we are on.
 class NoticeEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever we receive a notice.
 class OpEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a user (possibly us) gets granted operator status for a channel.
 class OwnerEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a user (possibly us) gets owner status granted in a channel.
 class PartEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever someone (possibly us) parts a channel which we are on.
 class PingEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever we receive a PING request from another user.
 class PrivateMessageEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever a private message is sent to us.
 class QuitEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever someone (possibly us) quits from the server.
 class RemoveChannelBanEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a hostmask ban is removed from a channel.
 class RemoveChannelKeyEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel key is removed.
 class RemoveChannelLimitEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when the user limit is removed for a channel.
 class RemoveInviteOnlyEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel has 'invite only' removed.
 class RemoveModeratedEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel has moderated mode removed.
 class RemoveNoExternalMessagesEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel is set to allow messages from any user, even if they are not actually in the channel.
 class RemovePrivateEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel is marked as not being in private mode.
 class RemoveSecretEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel has 'secret' mode removed.
 class RemoveTopicProtectionEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when topic protection is removed for a channel.
 class ServerPingEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          The actions to perform when a PING request comes from the server.
 class ServerResponseEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This is called when we receive a numeric response from the IRC server.
 class SetChannelBanEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a user (possibly us) gets banned from a channel.
 class SetChannelKeyEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel key is set.
 class SetChannelLimitEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a user limit is set for a channel.
 class SetInviteOnlyEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel is set to 'invite only' mode.
 class SetModeratedEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel is set to 'moderated' mode.
 class SetNoExternalMessagesEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel is set to only allow messages from users that are in the channel.
 class SetPrivateEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel is marked as being in private mode.
 class SetSecretEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a channel is set to be in 'secret' mode.
 class SetTopicProtectionEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when topic protection is enabled for a channel.
 class SuperOpEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a user (possibly us) gets superop status granted in a channel.
 class TimeEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever we receive a TIME request.
 class TopicEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever a user sets the topic, or when we join a new channel and discovers its topic.
 class UnknownEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever we receive a line from the server that PircBotX has not been programmed to recognize.
 class UserListEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched when we receive a user list from the server after joining a channel.
 class UserModeEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when the mode of a user is set.
 class VersionEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          This event is dispatched whenever we receive a VERSION request.
 class VoiceEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Called when a user (possibly us) gets voice status granted in a channel.
 

Uses of PircBotX in org.pircbotx.hooks.managers
 

Classes in org.pircbotx.hooks.managers with type parameters of type PircBotX
 class GenericListenerManager<E extends PircBotX>
          Deprecated. 
 interface ListenerManager<E extends PircBotX>
          Manages everything about Listeners: adding, removing, and dispatching events to appropriate listeners.
 class ThreadedListenerManager<E extends PircBotX>
          Wraps a ListenerManager and adds multithreading to ThreadedListenerManager.dispatchEvent(org.pircbotx.hooks.Event).
 

Uses of PircBotX in org.pircbotx.hooks.types
 

Classes in org.pircbotx.hooks.types with type parameters of type PircBotX
 interface GenericChannelModeEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Generic Channel Mode (not users status in the channel) change event
 interface GenericCTCPCommand<T extends PircBotX>
          Any event dealing with CTCP.
 interface GenericDCCEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Any event dealing with DCC.
 interface GenericEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Base interface that all Generic event interfaces must extend from.
 interface GenericMessageEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Generic event for an incoming message from a user, whether it be a private message, channel message, channel action, etc.
 interface GenericUserModeEvent<T extends PircBotX>
          Any user status change in a channel.
